snippet: The Saints may struggle to stop the Falcons' passing offense, which has become very dangerous as Matt Ryan has developed into a top-tier quarterback.
abstract: The Saints may struggle to stop the Falcons' passing offense, which has become very dangerous as Matt Ryan has developed into a top-tier quarterback.

headline.main: Week 10 Matchups: Plenty of Options for the Falcons
headline.print_headline: Options in the Air Keep The Falcons on a Glide Path
